channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winklevoss twins’ crypto company Gemini files for IPO
item.description: Another crypto company is headed for the public markets.

item.title: Sen. Hawley to probe Meta after report finds its AI chatbots flirt with kids
item.description: “Is there anything - ANYTHING - Big Tech won’t do for a quick buck?” Hawley wrote in a post on X announcing the investigation.

item.title: Sam Altman, over bread rolls, explores life after GPT-5
item.description: At a dinner with reporters in San Francisco, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman spilled details on the company's ambitions beyond ChatGPT.

item.title: Best Early Labor Day Mattress Sales (2025)
item.description: It's one of the best times of the year to score a new mattress. Here are all the best deals (plus some exclusive sale codes) to snag ahead of the long...

item.title: 9 Best Pillows (2025) Tested For Side, Back, and Stomach Sleepers
item.description: We’ve spent over a year testing the best pillows to support your noggin, whether you snooze on your side, back, or in a tangle of blankets.

item.title: How your solar rooftop became a national security issue
item.description: Texas solar company EG4 became the poster child for home energy cybersecurity risks this week after federal officials published an advisory detailing ...

item.title: Developers Say GPT-5 Is a Mixed Bag
item.description: Software engineers are finding that OpenAI’s new GPT-5 model is helping them think through coding problems—but isn’t much better at actual coding.

item.title: Decoding Palantir, the Most Mysterious Company in Silicon Valley
item.description: This week on Uncanny Valley, we talk about one of the most notorious American corporations. So what does Palantir actually do?

item.title: Les Amis, the European app helping women form friendships, launches in New York
item.description: Les Amis is an app designed to make it easy for women to form friendships and attend local events.

item.title: Best Apple Watch (2025): Buyer’s Guide to the Series 10 and SE
item.description: Should you splurge for the Series 10 or wait for the Series 11? Let us help you figure out which version to get (and which to avoid).
